pages.text: An organ located where the Warden's heart should be, violently gouged out by your hands, inevitably losing a portion in the process.$(br)Its essence is a pure aggregation of souls, and by absorbing it you gain their power.$(br)Scattered souls form armor, gathered souls drive energy, and what remains is only a hungry desire.$(br)Consuming this increases the player's soul energy by 10000 points.$(br)Dropped by Wardens

pages.title: Soul Convergence Room
pages.text: Consuming this increases the player's soul energy by 30000 points, and prevents the spawning of Illager Hunters for ten minutes.
